author: smuzaffar
body: `DRNTest` unit test fails for ASAN and UBSAN IBs as it is not able to start the fallback server. This PR proposes to disabled setting LD_PRELOAD=`libXsan.so` for this test. Same change was done in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36874 to fix `HeterogeneousCore/SonicTriton` unit tests
title: Unit test DRNTest: disabled setting LD_PRELOAD for xSAN IBs
